arts.ttl: Another Kane hat trick as Bayern beats Hoffenheim for Bundesliga record start
arts.sum: Harry Kane scored his second hat trick of the season on Saturday to steer Bayern Munich to a 4-1 win at Hoffenheim for the best Bundesliga start any team has made after four rounds. Bayern was fortunate Hoffenheim did not capitalize on its early dominance after coach Vincent Kompany opted to rotate his squad with five changes from the team that defeated Chelsea 3-1 in the Champions League on Wednesday — Kane scored twice in that game.

arts.ttl: Kompany after Bayern's 4-1 win: "Hoffenheim were better in the first half"
arts.sum: Despite Bayern Munich’s clear 4-1 victory over Hoffenheim, Vincent Kompany felt the Sinsheim side were the better team in the first half.

arts.ttl: Harry Kane sets a new penalty record in Hoffenheim win
arts.sum: Harry Kane’s hat-trick in Bayern Munich’s win over Hoffenheim on Matchday 4 not only meant that his side maintained their perfect start to the season, but also that the England forward's penalty record remains unblemished in the Bundesliga. Kane’s record-breaking journey began at home to rivals Augsburg when he slotted past Finn Dahmen on Matchday 2 of the 2023/24 season.

arts.ttl: European football: Kane fires hat-trick as Bayern Munich thrash Hoffenheim
arts.sum: England captain hits ninth treble for Bundesliga leaders Real Madrid sink Espanyol to keep up perfect start Bayern Munich maintained their flawless start in the Bundesliga by beating Hoffenheim 4-1 away on Saturday after Harry Kane netted two penalties and bagged his ninth hat-trick for the German league leaders. It was Kane’s second hat-trick of the campaign, after a second-half treble in their season opener against RB Leipzig, and he moved five clear at the top of the scoring charts with eight league goals in four matches. Continue reading...

Harry Kane scored a hat-trick in Bayern Munich's 4-1 Bundesliga win over Hoffenheim at the PreZero Arena. Hoffenheim did get one back through former West Ham right back Vladimír Coufal's deflected free-kick, but it was Bayern who had the last say, with Serge Gnabry tapping home a rebound deep into stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Kane completes hat-trick, Bayern put four past Hoffenheim
arts.sum: FC Bayern München win their fourth consecutive Bundesliga match this season, defeating TSG 1899 Hoffenheim 4-1 on Saturday afternoon. Harry Kane scored his second hat-trick of the season in the victory.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Hoffenheim 1-4 Bayern Munich – Kane nets NINTH Bundesliga hat-trick
arts.sum: Harry Kane scored his ninth Bundesliga hat-trick as Bayern Munich strolled to a 4-1 win against Hoffenheim at the PreZero Arena on Saturday afternoon. The Englishman took his league tally…

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Bayern Munich – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich and Hoffenheim go head-to-head in the Bundesliga on Saturday at the PreZero Arena. Both sides will be looking to maintain their early-season momentum, with Bayern sitting atop the table and Hoffenheim seeking to build on their promising start under Christian Ilzer. arts.sum: Vincent Kompany will be forced into one change when his Bayern Munich side travel to Sinsheim to face Hoffenheim in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. Josip Stanišić suffered a partial…
